mapper.select: select * from (select cs.*, csem.member_count from club_schedule cs left join ( select schedule_id, club_id, count(*) member_count from club_schedule_enroll_member group by schedule_id, club_id) csem on cs.schedule_id = csem.schedule_id and cs.club_id = csem.club_id where cs.club_id = #{club_id} order by cs.schedule_id desc) where rownum <= 9
